items.summary: Ensure the homepage Hero background image file exists in the deployed frontend static assets at the exact public path "/assets/generated/cruise-ship-hero.dim_1600x900.jpg" so it loads reliably after builds/deploys.

Update the Hero component (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx) to handle image load failures in a user-visible way while preserving the intended full-screen background behavior (e.g., show the existing gradient fallback plus a small, readable message indicating the image failed to load).
